about_the_game:
The In Sound Mind Deluxe Edition Artbook features character and environment art from the game and is included in the Deluxe Edition of the game.

Tonia opens up to Desmond and says, "Patience and Grace". The journey of In Sound Mind was one of "Patience and Grace". It started many many years ago and was patiently cultivated with the grace of friendship and passion about creating fun and immersive experiences. It makes us so incredibly excited for what you're about to play. This game wouldn't be possible without your support, so from the bottom of our hearts- Thank you for picking up In Sound Mind! You're our heroes. - We Create Stuff
